title: Zikr | Surah As-Saff (61:13)
romanUrdu: Allah ki taraf se madad aur qareeb aane wali fatah (kamiyabi).
description: Is Zikr ko padhne se Allah ki taraf se nusrat aur qareeb aane wali fatah (kamiyabi) milti hai. Rozana 11, 21 ya 33 martaba padhna sawab ka zariya hai.

title: Subhan Allah
description: Subhan Allah kehne se 100 sawab milte hain aur 100 gunah maaf hote hain. Ye Zikr tasbeeh me sub se zyada padha jata hai.

title: Alhamdulillah
romanUrdu: Tamam tareef Allah ke liye hai
description: Alhamdulillah kehne se niyamat badhti hain aur takleef door hoti hai. Har khushi aur takleef me Allah ka shukr ada karna chahiye.

title: Allahu Akbar
description: Allahu Akbar kehne se shaitan door bhagta hai aur dil ko sukoon milta hai. Namaz me ye sab se zyada bola jane wala kalma hai.

title: Surah Al-Baqarah – Ayat 1–4
arabic:
الٓمٓ
ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
romanArabic:
Alif Lām Mīm
Dhalika al-kitābu lā rayba fīhi hudan lil-muttaqīn
Alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ghaybi wa yuqīmūna ṣ-ṣalāta wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
Walladhīna yu'minūna bimā unzila ilayka wa mā unzila min qablika wa bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūn
romanUrdu:
Alif Lam Meem
Yeh kitaab hai, jismein koi shaq nahi, rehmat aur hidayat hai muttaqiyon ke liye
Jo log ghaib par iman rakhte hain aur namaz qayam karte hain aur jo kuch humne unko rizq diya, usme se kharch karte hain
Aur jo log iman late hain us cheez par jo aap par nazil hui aur us par jo pehle nazil hui, aur aakhirat par woh yaqeen rakhte hain
description: Yeh Quran ki pehli aayatein hain jo muttaqiyon ki sifat bayan karti hain. Inhein padhne se iman mazboot hota hai aur hidayat milti hai. Rozana ek martaba padhna kafi hai.
